title: Bloxd.io
description:
How to Play Bloxd.io
Bloxd.io is a sandbox game in which you navigate challenging obstacle courses by timing your jumps and movements accurately. In survival mode, you gather resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to stay alive. There are several game modes to choose from to start the game, each with a variety of challenges.

Bloxd.io Game Modes
Choose from one of the many game modes to begin your Bloxd.io journey.

BloxdHop.io
In the BloxdHop game mode your mission is to reach the end of the map within the given timeframe. To reach the end, you must hop through the level parkour-style onto blocks of various sizes.

DoodleCube
This game mode is similar to drawing games like Gartic.io. Players create objects based on the theme presented, and other users vote on how representative they are of that object.

EvilTower
The mission is to reach the top of the Evil Tower! Similar to BloxdHop, you use your parkour skills to reach the end. EvilTower is inspired by Roblox’s Tower of Hell.
shortDescription: Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

title: Count Masters: Stickman Games
description:
Tips and Tricks
Don’t just rush forward—choose gates that give you the best numbers, even if they’re not directly in your path.
Avoid red gates and dangerous traps that shrink your army.
Upgrade your starting crowd and gate bonuses early to grow faster in each run.
Watch enemy movements and time your attacks—charging in blindly can cost your entire team.
Save coins between runs to boost your strength and make harder levels easier.
Features
Fast-paced 3D runner with epic crowd battles
Fun strategy and math choices with every gate
Boss fights and challenging traps
Colorful, satisfying visuals and smooth controls
Developer
Count Masters is developed by FreePlay.

Last Updated
Jul 22, 2025

Controls
Mouse = Move the character by moving the mouse left or right. Left-click to select buttons.
Keyboard = Use the left and right arrow keys to move. Press space to select actions.
